METADATA.TITLE: Santeri Ora
METADATA.DESCRIPTION: Check Santeri's experience and latest ventures in full-stack development and entrepreneurship.

HOME.HEADING: Welcome to My Portfolio
HOME.INTRO_P1: Hi, I'm Santeri Ora, a Lean-driven full-stack developer and a second-time founder. I specialize in building scalable web applications, combining deep technical expertise with a strong business understanding.
HOME.INTRO_P2: I graduated at the end of 2025 with a Master's degree in Computer Science from Tampere University. Currently, I am focused on scaling my company, Superwider, where I am building a data-driven platform that automates performance-based influencer marketing through social media integrations.
HOME.INTRO_P3: I'm passionate about solving complex technical challenges and turning business needs into efficient software solutions. Let's connect, and don't forget to check out Superwider!
